document.full_text: if at&t and t-mobile combine, it will set up a match like coca-cola vs. pepsi, with at&t pitted against verizon. but getting antitrust approval may be difficult.
document.title: at&t's full cost for getting t-mobile
lines_and_colors: if at&t and t-mobile combine, it will set up a match like coca-cola vs. pepsi, with at&t pitted against verizon. but getting antitrust approval may be difficult.
